data.message: Legendary! This is no ordinary rapper. It's not easy to get to understand people like Em. You need to dig deep from his first album until the last to finally understand that he's on the league of his own. He is no rapper to be compared to other rappers. Lyrically gifted, dominant when it comes to story telling, killer flows and mad rhymes. That's a complete rapper.

replies.message: The dude is OK, Kendrick would rap circles around him

Duncan Reid...your the complete retard...(on the retard part...I was merely quoting this asshole) , you need to choose your words more wisely...I know quite a few Mentally & Physically challenged peeps & calling them that is totally freakin RUDE...Get a life dude!!! They can't help it but you can!!! EMINEM FREAKIN ROCKS!!!!
Kendrick couldn't do a thing against Em. LOL. He's good, but apparently you've not been paying attention the last 17-18 years.

My version of Stan is fucking incredible. I honestly think it's just as dope as the original, mines just from real life experiences. Verse 1 is from my perspective. Verse 2 is from my dad's perspective. Verse 3 just listen and if your familiar with the original song you will hear it. Verse 3 is from my mom's perspective may she Rest in Peace btw. Please just take time out of your day and listen. https://youtu.be/tkoF8vvnobA
Tristen Brown, you crazy! Em would murder him. No one will step to Em.

Tevin Harold shit is nice! I like it. I just think it would be better if you didn't use "nigga". That's why Em is so great. Never once used the word, doesn't have to. Today's rappers are WACK! Every single line they rhyme "nigga" with "nigga" that's not skill, that's lack of vocabulary...
